opportunity.title: Why Experienced Founders Choose Us
opportunity.subtitle: Traditional accelerators fail elite founders. We built something different.

cards.title: Zero Equity Model
cards.body: Our non-profit accelerator takes 0% equity, attracting founders who would never join YC or traditional programs.

cards.title: 3-Day Retreats
cards.body: Not a 3-month program. Experienced founders need focus and deadlines, not basic startup education.

cards.title: First Money In

bullets.title: No Adverse Selection
bullets.body: Every accelerator takes equity. The best founders have better options, so they don't participate. This creates adverse selection.
We flipped the model. Zero equity means zero adverse selection. The best founders join Inception because there's no downside.
Result: We see founders other investors never will. We invest before anyone else. We get the best terms.

thesis.title: Simple thesis, powerful edge
